# Getting Started
This guide contains the basic codes to get you started on NGS on the cluster at GIS.

## Resources
This guide is based on the following GIS HPC Guides:
1. [GIS Intranet](http://intranet.gis.a-star.edu.sg/opencms754/opencms/intranet/index.html)
1. <img src="./hh.img" height="200">
4. [GIS (HPC) Wiki](http://wiki.gis.a-star.edu.sg/index.php/Main_Page)

## Cluster Access
```bash
ssh teojyj@aquila.gis.a-star.edu.sg
ssh teojyj@ionode.gis.a-star.edu.sg
```

`Aquila` is the log in node and should not be used to run jobs or processes. To do that, submit jobs to other nodes via `qsub` or open an interactive session as follow:

`qrsh -l h_rt=5:00:00,mem_free=8G -pe OpenMP 1 -q interactive.q`

Change `h_rt` and `mem_free` depending on your own needs.
